resources.string: Connect with Specialized Doctors Online for\nConvenient and Comprehensive Medical\nConsultations.
Explore a Vest Array of Online Medical\nSpecialists, Offering Extensive Range of\nExpertise Tailored To Your Healthcare Needs.
Your account is ready to use.You will\nbe redirected to the home page in a few second....

Yangon General Hospital (YGH) is a large public hospital in Yangon, Myanmar. It\'s a 2,000-bed facility with a wide range of medical and surgical services, including specialist departments and a trauma center. YGH is also a major teaching hospital for several medical institutions in the country

Mandalay General Hospital (MGH), a 1,500-bed tertiary hospital in Mandalay, Myanmar, is a major teaching hospital linked with the University of Medicine, Mandalay. It serves as a primary teaching institution for the University of Medicine, Mandalay, alongside the Mandalay Workers\' Hospital
Yangon Children\'s Hospital (YCH) is the largest public pediatric hospital in Myanmar, serving as a major referral center for pediatric care. Located in Yangon,
Welcome to our Doctor Appointment app. By using this app, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.\n

You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and when using the services. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.\n

All appointments booked through the app are subject to availability. We do not guarantee the availability of any particular doctor or appointment slot. You must follow the instructions and provide all necessary information to book, modify, or cancel appointments.\n

Your privacy is important to us. We collect, store, and use your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy, which is part of these Terms. By using the app, you consent to such data practices.\n
Some services may require payment. All payments are handled securely through trusted payment gateways. The app does not store your payment information.\n

The app and its services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the app will be error-free, uninterrupted, or free of viruses or other harmful components. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of the app or inability to use the app.\n
All content, trademarks, and intellectual property displayed on the app are owned by or licensed to us. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without our explicit permission.\n
These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is registered.\n
If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact our support team via the app or email.\n
Thank you for choosing our Doctor Appointment app. We are committed to providing you with a safe and reliable experience.
